page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: WE AT{WARDEN HILL}ARE ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF{LUTON}IN AN URBAN AREA.WE HAVE BEEN DOING A SURVEY ON THE HOUSING HERE. } WE FOUND OUT THAT MOST PEOPLE LIVE IN A SEMI-DETATCHED HOUSE,NEXT CAME TERRACED,THEN DETATCHED,THEN BUNGALOWS AND FINALLY CHALET BUNGALOWS.IN THESE HOUSES THE MOST POPULAR NUMBER OF BEDROOMS ARE THREE. MOST PEOPLE HAVE LIVED HERE FROM ONE TO FIVE YEARS.THIS IS BECAUSE OF THREE NEW ESTATES IN OUR AREA. A LOT OF PEOPLE HAVE NOT GOT CONSERVATORIES OR EXTENSIONS. MOST PEOPLE HAVE GARAGES,BUT MANY PEOPLE IN TERRACED HOUSES DO NOT. FOR HEATING MOST PEOPLE HAD GAS RADIATOR CENTRAL HEATING BACKED UP BY GAS FIRES.NEARLY EVERYONE HAD LOFT INSULATION.BUT ONLY A THIRD OF THOSE SURVEYED HAD DOUBLE GLAZING AND CAVITY WALL INSULATION.
